author: James Martin
method: Preheat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Brush an ovenproof dish with melted butter and then coat with the grated chocolate. Place the strawberries into a food processor and blend until smooth. Transfer to a bowl and stir in the sugar and egg yolks. In a separate bowl, whisk the egg whites until stiff then fold into the strawberry mixture. Pour the mixture into the dish and place in the oven and bake for 8-10 minutes, or until well risen and golden. Remove from the oven and dust with icing sugar to serve.
ingredients: 30g/1oz unsalted butter, melted,  30g/1oz white chocolate, finely grated,  4 strawberries, stalks removed and chopped,  30g/1oz caster sugar,  2 free-range eggs, separated,  icing sugar for dusting
